short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover and automatically apply AliExpress coupons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
The AliExpress Discount Code Locator is a browser extension designed to enhance your shopping experience on AliExpress by automatically finding and applying the best available discount codes at checkout. This includes both store-specific codes and platform-wide discounts provided by AliExpress.

Features:
1. Automatic Discount Code Search: The plugin scans for applicable discount codes when you add items to your cart, ensuring you never miss a deal.
2. Store Discount Codes: Finds and applies discount codes specific to the store from which you're purchasing.
3. Platform Discount Codes: Applies platform-wide discounts provided by AliExpress to maximize your savings.
4. User-Friendly Interface: Seamless integration with the AliExpress checkout process, requiring no extra steps from the user.
5. Real-Time Updates: Continuously updated to include the latest discount codes and offers available on AliExpress.

How It Works:
1. Install the Extension: Add the AliExpress Discount Code Locator to your browser.
2. Shop as Usual: Browse and add items to your AliExpress cart.
3. Automatic Application: During the checkout process, the plugin will automatically search for and apply the best available discount codes.
4. Enjoy Savings: Complete your purchase with the best discounts applied effortlessly.

Make your AliExpress shopping experience more cost-effective and hassle-free with the AliExpress Discount Code Locator!
